item.title: aconcisehistory add a quote by Edwidge Danticat
item.description: "Their Maker, she said, gives them the sky to carry because they are strong. These people do not know who they are, but if you see a lot of trouble in your life, it is because you were chosen to carry part of the sky on your head. -pg. 25" -- Edwidge Danticat

item.title: aconcisehistory add a quote by Wole Soyinka
item.description: "Some of us – poets are not exactly poets. We live sometimes – beyond the word." -- Wole Soyinka

item.title: aconcisehistory add a quote by Eduardo Galeano
item.description: "I can't sleep. There is a woman stuck between my eyelids. I would tell her to get out if I could. But there is a woman stuck in my throat" -- Eduardo Galeano

item.title: aconcisehistory add a quote by Warsan Shire
item.description: "give your daughters difficult names. give your daughters names that command the full use of tongue. my name makes you want to tell me the truth. my name doesn’t allow me to trust anyone that cannot pronounce it right." -- Warsan Shire

item.title: aconcisehistory add a quote by Cindy Milstein and Erik Ruin
item.description: "What if we opened ourselves to the gift?" -- Cindy Milstein and Erik Ruin
